price: আৰু যিয়ে অণু পৰিমাণ অসৎকৰ্ম কৰিছে সেয়াও সি দেখিবলৈ পাব।
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
